projects.title: NC News Back End
projects.description: Engineered the back end for a bulletin-style website with a hosted API coded in Javascript and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: NC News Front End
projects.description: Designed and implemented the front-end of the NC News bulletin site with Javascript and React.

projects.title: Katatak
projects.description: A full-stack mobile application for practicing code implemented with Typescript and React Native as part of the final project on the Northcoders software engineering track.

projects.title: CP Calc
projects.description: A front-end application that calculates carbohydrate portions for type 1 diabetics. Utility functions were written in JavaScript and tested with Jest. The front-end was written with JavaScript, React and Bootstrap.
